title: Installing solar lighting in Malawi Africa

subtasks: Charge the battery using the solar panel.
Connect the Crocodile clips to the battery terminals.
Determine the correct terminal colors (Red and Black).
Install the solar panel on the roof.
Connect the two light bulbs to the battery.
Test the functionality of the lights by turning them on and off.
Confirm the battery's duration to power two bulbs.
Present the system to users and confirm their satisfaction.
Receive positive feedback from community members about the lighting.

tasks.task: Assemble and distribute a solar lighting system for agricultural use.
subtasks: Install solar panels on rooftops to charge batteries.
Connect light bulbs to the charged batteries and verify connections.
Arrange battery charging schedules based on solar panel exposure.
Provide user manuals and training for solar systems.
